title.value: Устойчивость развития продовольственной системы: методические аспекты
Stability of food system development: methodological aspects

journal.title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of Belarus. Agrarian Series

person.name: Ilyina, Z.M., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute of System Studies in Agro - Industrial Complex

abstract.value: The most important directions of national food security system appear security assurance in the sphere of foods, increase of people's life quality upon formation of competitive production level, and rise of economic efficiency of the food industry. Food security level is characterized with instability and needs continuous monitoring for well-timed complex evaluation of the development of national food system and effective response on problematic questions of food security management. Methodological aspects of the assessment of food system stability are investigated in the article. The problem is stated, and the objectives and factors binging about its solution are indicated. Methodological approaches to the assessment of agrarian production stability and algorithm of the technique of the complex assessment of food market stability are considered.
